window.web3 removal: Following extensive developer outreach, we are removing our deprecated window.web3 API. Action may be required if you’re a web3 site developer. Please see our migration guide for details.
Android injection fix: Sites will connect better with your wallet
Improved gas estimations for better transaction success rate (while not overpaying)
Bug fixes: app won’t crash when you upload files, e.g., during KYC
Security update

• Bug fixes: better error handling when unable to load a token’s balance, correct token amount displayed on payment request confirmation screen and token allowance approval request, and web3 sites using Cloudflare will now work on the in-app browser, and more..

What’s new (version 2.0)
- Swaps feature: The easiest way to swap your tokens. With fewer token approvals, slippage protection, you’ll find the best prices, everytime!
- Improvements in transaction history: You will see your transaction events by network & accounts
- Bug fixes on the ‘Sync with Extension’ feature

You can now more reliably sync your mobile wallet with your MetaMask extension wallet, and experience less app crashes.
MetaMask values our global audience, so we are now supporting these 10 languages: Chinese, Hindi, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Vietnamese. We are working on adding more languages, so stay tuned!

You can now more reliably sync your mobile wallet with your MetaMask extension wallet, and experience less app crashes.
MetaMask values our global audience, so we are now supporting these 10 languages: Chinese, Hindi, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Vietnamese. We are working on adding more languages, so stay tuned!

Blockchain transactions cost a Network fee. MetaMask will warn you if you entered a higher than estimated fee.
Sites can request you to add a custom network (e.g., Optimism, Polygon, BSC) in your wallet. The custom network fee on transactions is provided by the network operator.
Fix for the error “storage limit has been reached”. If you received this error, we regret the inconvenience this caused you.
We are deprecating an experimental opt-in only feature “InstaPay”.

After you onboard via ‘Sync with Extension’ option, your given account names will continue to show.
You’ll see an indication in your transaction history whether an outgoing transaction has happened from the device or not. This info will be logged in the state logs.
You’ll have the ability to add a custom nonce - you can submit a transaction with a changed order. This advanced feature can be enabled in Settings.

Safer user experience:
- “Seedphrase” is now termed as “Secret Recovery Phrase”! We included an explanatory video to communicate why you should keep your recovery phrase safe and secret, and best practices. This change is in English only; translation to other languages is coming soon.
- You will see a warning if the address you are sending to is an ENS name with a homoglyph or confusable character.

Along with some custom network UX improvements, you can now swap assets on Binance Smart Chain.

- NEW: Due to a protocol update EIP-1559, how your gas fees are calculated is changing on Ethereum Mainnet. The new gas fee estimations will increase the chances of transaction success! The fee is determined by network conditions & includes a tip for the miners. MetaMask doesn’t profit from this fee

- This update will require you to enter your password to enable biometrics again

- You’ll see FIAT conversions for tokens on Polygon & BSC networks now

- You can swap custom tokens now

- Bug fixes
